content.title: Configuring Actions for onMapping
content.body:
1. From the left pane of the mapping editor, expand Navigation Object and select lblFirstNameValue_text {string}.
  2. From the right pane of the mapping editor, expand Services > Service – RecipientStorage$Recipients$get and select RecipientID{number}.
  3. From the Action Editor canvas, select Callback.
  4. From the left menu of Action Editor, under the Network section, select Loading Indicator.
  5. From the right pane, for Loading Indicator select Dismiss.
